artist: Designer: Larsen Design Studio, New York; Mill: Taunus Textildruck Zimmer; Producer: Jack Lenor Larsen, Inc.
description: Velvet Discharge print,Larger-than-Life, overall Iris pattern with leaves. 36" pattern rpt.(all cotton pile) very pale green leaves with pastel gold Irises abt. 6" wide. 1.5" black selvedge on both sides. 3.5 - 3.75" machine hem at top and bottom Opaline
